title: Sampler, 1685
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: cross, double running and eyelet stitches on plain weave
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Fifteen cross borders in geometric and floral patterns and below, in a panel, the initials "S A S" and date "1685" in a wreath, floral ornament, crowns and alphabet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1685.
1685. Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: cross, double running and eyelet stitches on plain weave. Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe. 1941-69-256.
